title: Multimodal Mass Spectrometry - S. pyogenes Streptolysin O epitope
portal_description: Multimodal mass spectrometry identifies a conserved protective epitope in S. pyogenes Streptolysin O; combines multiple MS strategies for epitope discovery and validation.
